data.title: Mabel Normand
data.meta_description: The gal-pals start Funny Gals month with one of the greatest comedians of the silent era, Mabel Normand. data.text:
The gal-pals start Funny Gals month with one of the greatest comedians of the silent era, Mabel Normand. Debbi tells the tale of how Mabel went from Gibson Girl, to directing Charlie Chaplin, to being around to multiple murders!

YouTube Version

This week’s episode on YouTube has live video and it’s a different edit than the podcast

SHOW NOTES & EXTRAS:

We’re recording on Zoom so that means video!!!!

The gal-pals this month are Dr. Leah Leah, Bonnie Fillenwarth, Katie Harris and Debbi Sponsler

Does anyone remember laughter?!

Debbi’s 1 Cool Funny Gal is silent film star Mabel Norman

Birthday fun

Mable started as a model

Gibson Girl (more on Looking for Mabel Normand)

Vitograph Betty (More from The Keystone Girls)

Dash through the Clouds (YouTube)

Keystone studio with Mack Sennett

Mabel directed the first-ever feature film comedy Tillies Punctured Romance. It has Charlie Chaplin in it. (YouTube)

She was going to marry Mack Sennett

Head injury

Drug addict?

CORRECTION: Mabel did start the pie in the face gag. She threw a pie at Ben Turpin “creating what soon became the classic film comedy bit.” (Encyclopedia Britannica)

Mabel Normand Feature Film Company

CORRECTION: Mabel’s film Mickey, Mack Sennett said it grossed $18 million but it was really more like $8 million (TCM)

Then weird stuff happens

Fatty Arbuckle trials for manslaughter & rape

Murder of William Desmond Tayor

Public turns on Mabel

A chauffeur is shot with her gun!

Mrs. Georgia Church sues her

She gets married on a dare

Tuberculosis

Last movie One Hour Married is a missing film

Died at age 38

Quote “I had no president, nothing to imitate, I created my own standard of fun.”

Quote”Just because I’m a little, well, different people believe anything weird about me.”

196+ films (many are missing)

Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame

Broadway musical Mack & Mable

Song by Stevie Nicks, Mable Normand (YouTube)

SUPPORT US ON PATREON

Like what we do? Want more? On our Patreon page you can access more content including bloopers, behind the scenes.

ABOUT GAL’S GUIDE TO THE GALAXY PODCAST

What if you could only share 1 cool thing about a topic? Would it be about ancient history? Would it be breaking news? Would it be safe for work? A group of gals gathers to present to you one cool thing on topics like painting, gaming, movies, music and more.

Subscribe on iTunes, YouTube, Podbean, Stitcher. Google Play and more
